en.name: present indefinite
en.description: Describes actions or events happening in the present.

en.name: future indefinite
en.description: Describes actions or events that will happen in the future.

en.name: past indefinite
en.description: Describes actions or events that happened in the past, but not at a specific time.

en.name: present continuous
en.description: Describes actions or events that are happening right now or are currently in progress.

en.name: future continuous
en.description: Describes actions or events that will be ongoing at a specific future time.

en.name: past continuous
en.description: Describes actions or events that were ongoing or in progress at a specific point in the past.

en.name: present perfect
en.description: Describes actions or events that happened at an indefinite time in the past but have relevance to the present moment.

en.name: future perfect
en.description: Describes actions or events that will be completed before a specific point or action in the future.

en.name: past perfect
en.description: Describes actions or events that happened before another action or event in the past.

en.name: present perfect continuous
en.description: Describes actions or events that started in the past and are still ongoing or have just stopped.
